section.heading: Scope.
section.text: These regulations govern all licensed dentists, licensed dental hygienists, dental assistants, dental students, dental hygiene students, and dental assistant students.

section.heading: "Protection" Defined.
section.text: For purposes of these regulations, "protection" means the lead shielding of 0.25 millimeter lead equivalence or greater.

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: Dental X-Ray Protection, NCRP Report No. 35 (National Council on Radiation Protection and Measurements, Issued March 9, 1970), is incorporated by reference.

section.heading: Circumstances for Protection.
section.text: Protection shall be placed over the patient in accordance with Dental X-Ray Protection, NCRP Report No. 35.

section.heading: Exceptions.
section.text: Protection is not required if its use would interfere with the diagnostic quality of the resultant radiographs.

section.heading: Penalties for Violation.
section.text: A violation of these regulations during the exposure of dental radiographs constitutes unprofessional conduct.
